object_attributes.description:
This MR does several rework of the sapling benchmark

- Most importantly it fixes a bug that created incorrect transactions for benchmarking
- It does four different benches (with/wo inputs/outputs) to have a better fit
- It removes bound data as we plan to take the bound_data length into account independently since the gas cost will be the same as the one for Blake2
object_attributes.title: Marc@sapling bench

last_commit.message: Tezt/Snoop/Sapling: more reasonable numbers for benchmarks
last_commit.title: Tezt/Snoop/Sapling: more reasonable numbers for benchmarks

object_attributes.description:
# Context 
A version of `proto_alpha` which compiles to Coq, used for https://nomadic-labs.gitlab.io/coq-tezos-of-ocaml/ Not intended to be merged as it is.

![chicken_run](https://gitlab.com/tezos/tezos/uploads/082f17993d8e4f8e12a19ef32ef17d84/chicken_run.gif)
object_attributes.title: Draft: Ongoing branch with changes to compile the protocol to Coq üêî

object_attributes.description:
# Context 

Fixes #2589.

The L2 block store of the Tx rollup node now uses a data file together with an index file, similarly to how the (floating) block store of Tezos is represented. There are additional indexes for mapping of levels and Tezos block hashes to L2 block hashes.

Rebased on !4678 atm.

# Manually testing the MR

```
dune exec tezt/tests/main.exe -- -f tx_rollup_node.ml
```

# Checklist

- [x] Document the interface of any function added or modified (see the [coding guidelines](https://tezos.gitlab.io/developer/guidelines.html))
- [-] Document any change to the user interface, including configuration parameters (see [node configuration](https://tezos.gitlab.io/user/node-configuration.html))
- [-] Provide automatic testing (see the [testing guide](https://tezos.gitlab.io/developer/testing.html)).
- [-] For new features and bug fixes, add an item in the appropriate changelog (`docs/protocols/alpha.rst` for the protocol and the environment, `CHANGES.rst` at the root of the repository for everything else).
- [x] Select suitable reviewers using the `Reviewers` field below.
- [x] Select as `Assignee` the next person who should [take action on that MR](https://tezos.gitlab.io/developer/contributing.html#merge-request-assignees-field)
object_attributes.title: Storage improvements in Tx rollup node
